content.description:
Equilibrium constants for two reactions are shown.

<math alttext="M n with a positive 2 charge plus C 2 O 4 with a negative 2 charge, is in equilibrium with M n C 2 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Mn</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo>⇄</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>MnC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="K 1, equals 1 times 10 to the power of 3" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mi>K</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="open bracket, M n, open parenthesis, C 2 O 4, close parenthesis, 2, close bracket, with a negative 2 charge, is in equilibrium with M n C 2 O 4 plus C 2 O 4 with a negative 2 charge" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>Mn</mtext><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo>⇄</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>MnC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
 <math alttext="K 2, equals 1 times 10 to the power of negative 2" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mi>K</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>
content.question:
Which of the following is the value of the equilibrium constant for the following reaction?

<math alttext="M n with a positive 2 charge, plus 2 C 2 O 4 with a negative 2 charge, is in equilibrium with, open bracket, M n, open parenthesis, C 2 O 4, close parenthesis, 2, close bracket, with a negative 2 charge" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>Mn</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>+</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"> </mspace> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>C</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <msup> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>O</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>−</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mo>⇄</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>[Mn</mtext> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>(</mtext> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>C</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>O</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>)</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>]</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>−</mo> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

choices.label: <math alttext="1 times 10 to the power of negative 5" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="1 times 10 to the power of negative 1" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>
<math alttext="1 times 10 to the power of 0" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>
<math alttext="1 times 10 to the power of 5" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1 times 10 to the power of 5" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
